creator: elayaraja.s@gmail.com
text:
Hi,
  I am using incubating-lenya-1.2-src,cocoon-2.1.5.1-src,Tomcat5.0. According 
to "Installation of the Cocoon and Lenya Source Version" From the installation 
instruction( 9 th step ) we have to copy 
local.build.properties 
local.blocks.properties 
from $LENYA_HOME/src/cocoon to $COCOON_HOME. 
If this is the case i am build was not done properly. 
I excluded by adding these two files build was working properly.
When i tried to "ant install" i am facing error as "check coccon webapps dir 
is availbale" but buid was success.

When i am trying to invoke by using tomcat "http://localhost:8080/lenya" its 
fine. But i dont know how to invoke the sample files which is located under 
cocoon/src/blocks/samples/forms.

Thanks in advance.

This is certainly not a Lenya bug, but a setup issue. Please ask for help on the
lenya-user mailing list.
creator: andreas@apache.org
elayaraja.s@gmail.com
text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> This is certainly not a Lenya bug, but a setup issue. Please ask for help on 
the
> lenya-user mailing list.

Can u plz give me the link regarding lenya-user mailing list that which i 
whant to post my queries.

Information about the Lenya mailing lists can easily be found on the Lenye-website:
http://lenya.apache.org/community/mailing-lists.html
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
